CreateRocketMQGroup.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tdmq.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateRocketMQGroup
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Remark": "example",
    "BroadcastEnable": "true",

    "RetryMaxTimes": "16",
    "Namespaces": [
        "example"
    ],
    "ReadEnable": "true",
    "GroupType": "TCP",
    "GroupId": "group-example"
}
CreateRocketMQGroup.title: 创建订阅组
